title: 2015 Women's South American Volleyball Championship
text:
The 2015 Women's South American Volleyball Championship was the 31st edition of the <a href="Women%27s%20South%20American%20Volleyball%20Championship">Women's South American Volleyball Championship</a> held in <a href="Cartagena%2C%20Colombia">Cartagena, Colombia</a> and organised by South America's governing volleyball body, the <a href="Confederaci%C3%B3n%20Sudamericana%20de%20Voleibol">Confederación Sudamericana de Voleibol</a> (CSV). <a href="Brazil%20women%27s%20national%20volleyball%20team">Brazil</a> won its 19th title with <a href="Gabriela%20Guimar%C3%A3es">Gabriela Guimarães</a> being elected Most Valuable Player.
Competing nations.
